definition: Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
day/sky/heaven
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
surname Gong
Monkey Wreaks Havoc in Heaven, story about the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

sentences.english: Oh, it's a reserved opera named "The Monkey Creates Havoc in Heaven".
sentences.chinese: 哦，那是一場保留劇目，名叫“大鬧天宮”。

sentences.english: Have you ever played with horoscopes or Ouija boards?
sentences.chinese: 你玩過天宮圖或通靈遊戲嗎？

sentences.english: He is Sun Wukong, the Great Sage Equaling Heaven, who made havoc in Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 就是那大鬧天宮的齊天大聖孫悟空。

sentences.english: The surrounding celestial region, the Ziwei Star, was the realm of the Celestial Emperor and his family.
sentences.chinese: 天宮的紫薇垣周邊，是玉帝及其家族的領地。

sentences.english: Tien-kung Sun warm , pagoda door open ;
The Tiangong-2 launch was telecast live on state TV.
sentences.chinese: 天宮二號發射時，電視進行了現場直播。

sentences.english: He is the designer of the Tiangong-1 Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 他是天宮一號空間站的設計師。

sentences.english: China is expected to launch its Tiangong 1 space laboratory in the coming days.
sentences.chinese: 中國近日將發射天宮一號空間實驗室。

sentences.english: After the havoc in heaven monkey king is captured and sealed in a magic furnace.
sentences.chinese: 大鬧天宮後，孫悟空遭擒拿被打入八卦爐冶煉。

sentences.english: The scene design of The Monkey King contains the richness of national culture.
sentences.chinese: 《大鬧天宮》的場景設計蘊涵着民族文化的豐富性。

sentences.english: They are expected to dock with China's first space lab module, Tiangong-1, she said at a press conference, Xinhua reported.
sentences.chinese: 它們有望對接中國首個太空實驗艙“天宮一號”。

sentences.english: The Tiangong-1 is an essential step toward the goal of building a space station.
sentences.chinese: 天宮僅僅是組成中國廣大的空間探測項目的冰山一角。

sentences.english: "Making havoc in Heaven" is a typical military play.
sentences.chinese: 《大鬧天宮》是一部典型的武戲。

sentences.english: Jo would whistle and made a great racket getting ready.
sentences.chinese: 裘口哨吹得呼呼響，正在大鬧天宮似地作準備。

definition: 2nd day of the month
flying Apsara (Buddhist art)
a censer (for burning incense)/incense burner/thurible
the human world/the earth
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
long life
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
surname Gong
temple/ancestral shrine/CL:座[zuo4]/temple fair/great imperial hall/imperial
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
trace/vestige/historical remains/remnant
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane
altar
imperial canopy (e.g. domed umbrella-like roof over carriage)/aureole/halo
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
